articles.author: Gerrit De Vynck
articles.title: The surprising issue driving a wedge between Trump and his MAGA base - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s attempt to block states from regulating AI sparked pushback from Republicans concerned the tech will displace workers and harm kids.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO President Donald Trump faces an unexpected riftin the MAGA movement as Republican officials from statehouses to Capitol Hill warn his full-throated embrace of the tech industrys artific… [+108 chars]
